QuestData.Title: Hiding in the Shadows
QuestData.Description: <The voice of Teron'gor enters your mind.>$B$BOur final move must remain concealed from the Auchenai, my minions. Use the shadow orbs Gul'dan provided for us to veil Gul'rok in darkness.$B$BPrepare our forces, we march on Auchindoun on my order. We will feast on the souls of the draenei and usher our demonic allies into this world!$B$B<Destroying these shadow orbs would help the defenders at Auchindoun greatly.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy the three Shadow Orbs in Gul'rok.
QuestData.RewardText: Without the shadow orbs, the main Auchenai force will be able to march on Gul'rok safely.
